title: Franz Kafka - Fiction, Letters & Diaries (14 books)
description:
This is a compilation of my previous FRANZ KAFKA (1883 - 1924) torrents with a number of new materials added, including multiple translations of THE TRIAL, THE CASTLE, and some of the short stories.  (The four volumes of Kafka's invaluable letters were kindly uploaded on my request by Livhre, who gave me permission to reproduce them here.)

It is, to my knowledge, the most comprehensive single collection of Kafka's works in English on the internet.


The books are a mix of PDF and/or EPUB formats as specified below:

* AMERIKA (The Man Who Disappeared) (Penguin, 1996).  Translated by Michael Hofmann. -- EPUB

* THE CASTLE (Oxford World's Classics, 2009).  Translated by Anthea Bell. -- PDF

* THE CASTLE: A New Translation Based on the Restored Text (Schocken, 1998).  Translated by Mark Harman. -- EPUB

* THE COMPLETE STORIES (Schocken, 1983).  Edited by Nahum M. Glatzer and with a foreword  by John Updike. -- EPUB

* DIARIES, 1910-1923 (Schocken Books, 1988).  Edited by Max Brod. -- EPUB

* LETTERS TO FELICE (Schocken, 1973).  Translated by James Stern and Elisabeth Duckworth; edited by Erich Heller and JÃƒÂ¼rgen Born. -- EPUB [courtesy of Livhre]

* LETTERS TO FRIENDS, FAMILY & EDITORS (Schocken, 1977).  Translated by Richard and Clara Winston. -- EPUB [courtesy of Livhre]

* LETTERS TO MILENA (Schocken, 1990).  Translated and with an Introduction by Philip Boehm. -- EPUB + PDF

* LETTERS TO OTTLA & THE FAMILY (Schocken, 1982).  Translated by Richard and Clara Winston; edited by Nahum M. Glatzer. -- EPUB [courtesy of Livhre]

* THE METAMORPHOSIS & OTHER STORIES (Oxford World's Classics, 2009).  Translated by Joyce Crick. -- PDF

* THE METAMORPHOSIS, IN THE PENAL COLONY & OTHER STORIES (Scribner, 2000).  Translated by Joachim Neugrochel. -- EPUB

* THE TRIAL (Oxford World's Classics, 2009).  Translated by Mike Mitchell. -- PDF

* THE TRIAL: A New Translation Based on the Restored Text (Schocken Books, 1998).  Translated by Breon Mitchell -- EPUB

* THE ZÃƒÅ“RAU APHORISMS (Harvill Secker, 2006).  Translated by Michael Hofmann, with an Introduction and Afterword by Robert Calasso. -- EPUB
